data_prep.reason: To enable quantitative analysis and calculations.
To enable financial calculations and analysis.
To enable time-series analysis and proper date comparisons.

recommended_eda.reason: To calculate the total revenue generated by each item in an order, which is a crucial business metric.
To understand the distribution of quantities ordered per item, identifying common order sizes.
To understand the distribution of product prices, identifying common price points and potential outliers.
To identify the most popular products by sales volume and revenue, informing inventory and marketing strategies.
To identify sales trends over time (e.g., hourly, daily, monthly), revealing peak sales periods and seasonality.
To identify top-performing cities/states in terms of sales, useful for targeted marketing and logistics planning.
To discover which products are frequently purchased together, enabling cross-selling opportunities and bundle recommendations.
